creator: james.canada@cubepoint.com
text:
Tomcat stops running automatically.
It may run for 10 minutes then it stops its service.

When filing a bug, you have to give some details on how you ran into the
problem, and how we could reproduce the problem (since in the general case, it's
working fine for me).
If there is information in the logs, or exceptions displayed in the standard out
it could be useful to include them.
Reopen the bug with the added information if you fail to solve the problem.
